posts.postText: Change the traitor mic key and add sprint. I hate not being able to run.

What would you change it to?

Only thing I can think of is your sandbox noclip key. But even that would make things a LOT more difficult.

I say no.

>> Ben":2bg5fy5l]Change the traitor mic key and add sprint. I hate not being able to run. 


Traitor mic key can be adjustable to yourself in options, Just change the team speak to something.

Sprint, Nah

Sprinting would ruin the gameplay.  Being forced to walk all the time is far better than having to wait for a damned sprint meter to refill.  Plus, our maps are really small to have sprint, don't you think???
